meanings.sent1: The multiband radio can pick up signals from different stations.
meanings.sent2: The multiband antenna is designed to receive signals from various frequencies.
meanings.sent3: The multiband watch can display time in different time zones simultaneously.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was like a multiband rainbow, with clothes of every color.
meanings.sent5: The multiband flag fluttered in the wind, showcasing a spectrum of colors.

meanings.definition: A device or system that operates on multiple bands.
meanings.sent1: The multiband router ensures a stable internet connection across different frequencies.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy a multiband phone to use it in various countries.
meanings.sent3: The multiband toaster can toast bread at different levels of crispiness.
meanings.sent4: His music system was like a multiband orchestra, playing tunes from various genres.
meanings.sent5: The multiband camera captures images with clarity in different lighting conditions.

meanings.sent1: She decided to multiband the project into smaller tasks for better organization.
meanings.sent2: The artist will multiband the painting process to focus on different sections.
meanings.sent3: He tried to multiband his study time but ended up procrastinating.
meanings.sent4: The chef will multiband the cooking process to ensure each dish is prepared perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The teacher will multiband the class into groups for a collaborative project.
